ai-patthana23.22:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: the Protector of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana23.22:0.3_0: Not over-exertion, they look forwards and so on.
ai-patthana23.22:1.1_0: Not grasping does not give rise to skillful qualities, cause or reason.
ai-patthana23.22:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.22:3.1_2: the five hindrances are not clear.
